basics.name: Diógenes Fernandes
basics.label: Staff Platform Engineer | Computer Science MSc @ Georgia Tech
basics.summary:
As a Staff Engineer, I leverage my 14+ years of remote work experience and my MSc in Computing Systems from Georgia Tech to create and secure products and infrastructure that enable scalable and robust systems.

My passion for web security and cloud engineering drives me to constantly learn and apply new technologies and best practices to solve complex and challenging problems. I hold multiple certifications from cloud providers and open source tooling, and I participate in online CTF competitions as a player for FireShell Security Team, where I hone my skills in web exploitation, cryptography, reverse engineering, and programming.

references.name: Igor Portela
references.reference: I've known Diogenes since 2008, he was certainly one of the highlights of the college, one of the first to get a good job and set an example for many people. He is a natural leader, with irrefutable technical skills, Dynamic and easily adaptable to any environment, whatever path he wants to follow in his career, I'm sure he will do it with a lot of focus, discipline and persistence. From Dev to DevSec or DevSecOps, or whatever, I trust his work.

references.name: Manoel de A. L. Amaro
references.reference: I know Diógenes Fernandes for more than 9 years, since we studied together at the college. Since then showing himself a great developer, with strong skills, great logic thinking to solve any kind of problem and major knowledge of the newest technologies available, Diogenes is one of the best developers/software engineers I know. When we worked together, he also showed great leadership skills managing a remote team with people around the world, leading us to solve all problems easily and making the team delivery all results with quality. I am very happy to recommend him to any company, confident that he will always give his best, working together with the team and help everyone who needs to archive all company's goals.
